name: Arc'teryx Sabre LT Bib Pants - Men's
description: Designed to handle the demands of aggressive skiers on- or off-piste, the Sabre LT bibs are waterproof-breathable and ruggedly built. Long thigh vents let you dump heat during high energy chair laps and bootpacks, while the roomy fit accommodates multiple layers for cold descents. The overall build quality is top-notch, with durable kick patches, tight seam tolerances and articulated construction that won't hold you back on the down or the up.Completely waterproof, breathable and durable GORE-TEX construction.Hard-wearing 80-denier face fabric.C-KNIT™ lining backer is soft and breathable.Wee Burly™ softshell bib has plenty of stretch for ease of movement.Micro seam allowance of 1.6mm and extra narrow 8mm seam tape reduce bulk and weight.Articulated construction and gusseted crotch for freedom of movement.Front fly with snap closure.Thigh zips for easy venting.Highly water-resistant external zippers used throughout.Durable kick patches protect against ski edges.Powder cuffs with gripper elastic keep snow out.
